author: Tim Hume, VICE News, chloe angyal
title: Amazon Was Just Forced to Shut Down All of Its Warehouses in France Over Worker Safety
description: A court agreed with France's labor unions: Amazon isn't doing enough to keep its workers safe.
content:

 Amazon temporarily closed all six of its distribution warehouses in France on Thursday, after a court ruled it had failed to adequately protect staff from coronavirus, and ordered it to restri… [+3522 chars]
